children.text: There have not been ember guards fitted to the roof ventilator of this home.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas, states that

‘Openings in vented roof lights, roof ventilators or vent pipes shall be fitted with ember guards made from a mesh or perforated sheet with a maximum aperture of 2 mm, made of corrosion-resistant steel, bronze or aluminium’ .
The builder must install ember guards to comply with the requirements of AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas.
